医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
双胞胎开始怀孕的怀孕比单身人士要比预期的要小根据美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）研究人员的一项研究，双胞胎 - 平均而言，平均而不是单身人士，比以前所知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/twins-begin-pregnancy-smaller-than-singletons-than-singletons-earlier-than-than-xend.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/twins-begin-pregnancy-smaller-than-singletons-than-singletons-earlier-than-than-xexped.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb5934e8-d99b-4f5f-b371-cf2042d475fb Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:23:48 -0400 Twins begin pregnancy smaller than singletons earlier than expected
多布斯之后，数百万的少女面临堕胎障碍罗特斯健康研究人员称，有超过700万的美国青少年女孩13至17岁，在堕胎禁令，限制性妊娠限制或父母参与要求的州生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/millions-of-teen-girls-face-barriers-to-abortion-abortion-access-access-after-ferter-dobbs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/millions-of-teen-girls-face-barriers-to-abortion-abortion-access-access-after-fter-ferter-dobbs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d73fb961-898a-4654-4654-A954-9693D26B88BA Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:12:01 -0400 Millions of teen girls face barriers to abortion access after Dobbs
新的神经元重建亨廷顿氏病中受损的电路新的研究表明，成人大脑可以产生新的神经元，以整合到关键的运动电路中。研究结果表明，刺激自然脑过程可能有助于修复亨廷顿和其他疾病中受损的神经网络。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-neurons-rebuild-damameged-circuits-circuits-in-huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-neurons-rebuild-damameged-circuits-circuits-in-huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5B3BC4E6-C0BB-4C09-83A1-CC2A691A74C0 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:00:13 -0400 New neurons rebuild damaged circuits in Huntington’s disease
新颖的计算工具可帮助科学家发现疾病背后的隐藏细胞类型整个身体的细胞像合唱团中的歌手一样一起工作，以使我们保持健康，只要他们以完美的和谐工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/novel-computational-tool-helps-helps-scientists-detect-hidded-hidded-cell-cell-cell-types-behind-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/novel-computational-tool-helps-helps-scientists-detect-detect-hidded-cell-cell-types-behind-behind-behind-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2Eda61e6-ac99-4324-9108-f0ea45ecf46b Mon, 07 Apr 2025 13:38:37 -0400 Novel computational tool helps scientists detect hidden cell types behind disease
年轻的女性更容易受到智能手机依赖的社交焦虑今天在欧洲精神病学协会2025年大会上发表的一项新研究表明，性别在过度和有问题的（心理或行为依赖性）智能手机的使用中起着重要作用，年轻的女性比其他性别更有可能经历更高的社交焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/young-females-more-vulnerable-to-social-ancial-anxier-from-smartphone decendence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/young-females-more-vulnerable-to-social-ancial-ancial-ancial-ancial-from-smartphone decendence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A4C135D4-00B1-446D-B466-94811EC43D5F Mon, 07 Apr 2025 12:47:01 -0400 Young females more vulnerable to social anxiety from smartphone dependence
新指南旨在改善儿童支原体肺炎的诊断和治疗中国医学协会已发布了新的指南，以诊断和治疗儿童的支原体肺炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/New-guidelines-aim-to-improve-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-mycoplasma-pneumoniae-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-guidelines-aim-to-improve-diagrove-diagrove-diaregnosis-and-wareatment-of-mycoplasma-pneumoniaiae-in-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bd5f6f4-a10d-4B63-BA4F-7395DF8486B1 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 12:18:00 -0400 New guidelines aim to improve diagnosis and treatment of mycoplasma pneumoniae in children
联邦卫生机构的解雇裁员办公室，发布公共记录根据透明的倡导者和卫生专家的说法，公众访问记录疾病处理，有缺陷的产品和安全失误的政府记录将在联邦卫生和公共服务部的大规模开枪扫除负责释放记录的工作人员之后放缓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/firings-at-federal-health-health-agencies-decimate-decimate-decimate-decimate-decimate-that-rease-public-public-records.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/firings-at-federal-health-health-agecies-decimate-decimate-decimate-felices-that-rease-public-public-records.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1fcc46f-c7e2-44AD-8F51-171615382707 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 12:04:54 -0400 Firings at federal health agencies decimate offices that release public records
用精度医学预测皮肤利什曼病的治疗失败全世界近一百万人每年都会受到皮肤利什曼病的困扰，皮肤利什曼病是由利什曼原虫寄生虫引起的毁灭性皮肤感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/predicting-treatment-failure-in-cutaneous-cutaneous-leishmaniasis-with-precision-precision-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/predicting-wareatment-failure-in-cutaneous-cutaneous-leishmaniasis-with-precision-precision-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c83b5cd0-49fe-4d8e-4d8e-a737-6A6EE81E4440D Mon, 07 Apr 2025 10:31:12 -0400 Predicting treatment failure in cutaneous leishmaniasis with precision medicine
